page.title: 05ORCHARDS AROUND FENLAND
page.content: {Apples,pears}and{plums}are produced in great variety in the{orchards}of {Fenland.}Most apple and pear orchards are grass_bottomed,but a few acres are under_planted with crops,such as gooseberries.The trees are pruned in the winter,and then sprayed throughout the spring and summer to guard against diseases.The most popular dessert apple varieties are Cox, Worcester, Laxton Fortune and Suberb, and Discovery. Bramley cooking apples are grown in far greater quantity than any others.The main plum varieties are Czar, Victoria, Burbanks, and Pershores. Conference, is the main sort of pear;this crop is harvested in the late autumn and the fruit is often cold_stored, together with Bramleys and Coxes, for later marketing throughout the winter.
